config.question: Which was the first state apart from Louisiana to be formed out of the Louisiana Purchase?

answer_3.response: Missouri was the first state, other than Louisiana, to be carved out of the Louisiana Purchase, and resolving the status of slavery there would have implications for the rest of the trans-Mississippi West.
